templates.name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement
templates.description: Standard mutual NDA for protecting confidential information during business discussions and evaluations

templates.name: Mutual NDA Cover Page
templates.description: Cover page template for completing a Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement with party details and terms

templates.name: Cloud Service Agreement
templates.description: Framework agreement for cloud service delivery including SaaS, access rights, support, and payment terms

templates.name: Service Level Agreement
templates.description: SLA defining uptime commitments, response times, and service credits for cloud services

templates.name: Design Partner Agreement
templates.description: Agreement for early product access, feedback provision, and product improvement partnerships

templates.name: Professional Services Agreement
templates.description: Framework agreement for outsourced professional services including SOWs, deliverables, and IP rights

templates.name: Data Processing Agreement
templates.description: DPA for GDPR and data protection compliance covering data processing, transfers, and subject rights

templates.name: Partnership Agreement
templates.description: Flexible partnership agreement covering cooperation, payments, trademark licensing, and dispute resolution

templates.name: Software License Agreement
templates.description: License agreement for software distribution including restrictions, updates, warranties, and termination

templates.name: Pilot Agreement
templates.description: Short-term pilot program agreement for testing products with evaluation-only access and limited warranties

templates.name: Business Associate Agreement
templates.description: HIPAA Business Associate Agreement for handling Protected Health Information (PHI)

templates.name: AI Addendum
templates.description: Addendum for AI/ML services covering model training, data usage, IP ownership, and AI limitations
